TopicTitle: Can you guess the context of this screenshot?

Articles.Content:
Let's play a game (no, not KSP).
My game suddenly froze up because I did something dumb. I was able to hit printscreen before force closing it, though. From the final screenshot, what do you think happened? I am running a modded install, you can list mods you recognize that I am using too as part of your deductions.
Note: This is not an attempt to solicit technical advice. I just want to see what people make of my screenshot.

Kinda obvious, it seems. Let me guess:

Your BDA plane got shot down by AA rockets. Looks like a rather unhealthy amount of rockets, too. Also first took down another emplacement on science building? Mods are kerbingeneer, BDA, that one fx mod, FAR, Hyperedit. Not sure about the plane on the pannel to the left.

Not entirely sure why it's asking for a crew report tho (which can only be triggered with a crew capsule?), maybe that's what crashed your game?
You're about to get hit by a ton of rounds.

Nice job spotting the other emplacement and spotting Collision fx. Yes, the crew report was probably a factor in crashing, but I've done it before without crashing, so it's not the sole cause. Are you sure it's AA rockets? Usually they blow the plane up a lot more, especially in the wing parts. What direction are the rockets coming from? and why would I trigger a crew report in the first place, on a drone plane nonetheless? What is causing the collision effects?
Usually my ksp crashes due to too many things happening at once. Could that be a clue?

You spilled coffee on your keyboard and caffeine got injected directly into the Kraken's bloodstream. 

It's the only explanation.
